commit.message: Replaced HTML named entity · with × in Javadoc.

Small optimization in private split().
Added tests to compare String and Pattern implementations, in particular for one char regex.

8305486: Add split() variants that keep the delimiters to String and j.u.r.Patten
Clarification about zero-width matches at the beginning of the input

8305486: Add split() variants that keep the delimiters to String and j.u.r.Pattern
Removed duplicate paragraph in Javadoc
Clarified that the returned array also includes the delimiters

8305486: Add split() variants that keep the delimiters to String and j.u.r.Pattern
Restored original JavaDoc to existing methods.
Replaced proposed parametrized split(*, boolean) methods with suggested splitWithDelimiters(*) variants.
Adjusted tests accordingly.
